374//*****************************************************************************
375//
381//
382//*****************************************************************************
383#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_DERR (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_DERR, 1))
384#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_DCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_DCMP, 1))
385#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_WCINC (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_WCINC, 1))
386#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_WCEXC (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_WCEXC, 1))
387#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_FIFOOVR2 (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_FIFOOVR2, 1))
388#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_FIFOOVR1 (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_FIFOOVR1, 1))
389#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_SCNCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_SCNCMP, 1))
390#define AM_HAL_ADC_INT_CNVCMP (_VAL2FLD(ADC_INTEN_CNVCMP, 1))
392
393//*****************************************************************************
394//
414//
415//*****************************************************************************
416#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_SAMPLE(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_DATA, value) >> 6)
417#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_FULL_SAMPLE(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_DATA, value))
418#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_SLOT(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_SLOTNUM, value))
419#define AM_HAL_ADC_FIFO_COUNT(value) (_FLD2VAL(ADC_FIFO_COUNT, value))
